column5: was thinking of heading out in the am (sunday)  are the rivermouths locked up with ice or are they fishable.  port hope?
went this morning to a couple spots pretty well froze up and unfishable unless your a bottom bouncer out off the pier good luck!  Hawk
Yep...creek mouths from Oshawa to Ganaraska all frozen....  Tried a few drifts, but this is as far as we got....LOL
I second CCMTs motion.  Although I did manage to lose two fish, due to hooking them in 1 foot wide runs of open water, with 10 feet of ice on either side....
